subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Tim Jitloff repeated as giant slalom champion at the United States Alpine Ski Championships at Alyeska Resort in Girdwood, Alaska. Tommy Ford of Bend, Ore., was second, and Warner Nickerson of Gilford, N.H., was third, the same finish order as last year. Jitloff, of Truckee, Calif., was first in both runs Tuesday and finished in a combined time of 2 minutes 17.73 seconds. Ford was fourth after the first run but finished in 2:18.48 to edge Nickerson, who finished in 2:18.67.
